mapper.select: SELECT a.ACHV_ID AS achvId, a.ACHV_TITLE AS achvTitle, a.ACHV_CONTENT AS achvContent, a.ACHV_MAX_POINT AS achvMaxPoint, up.CURRENT_VALUE AS currentValue, up.IS_COMPLETED AS isCompleted FROM ACHV a JOIN USER_ACHV_PROGRESS up ON a.ACHV_ID = up.ACHV_ID WHERE up.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT A.ACHV_ID AS achvId, A.ACHV_TITLE AS achvTitle, A.ACHV_CONTENT AS achvContent, A.ACHV_MAX_POINT AS achvMaxPoint, UAL.CURRENT_VALUE AS currentValue, UAL.IS_REWARDED AS isRewarded, TO_CHAR(UAL.ACHIEVED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS achievedDate, R.REWARD_ID AS rewardId, R.REWARD_TYPE AS rewardType, R.REWARD_VALUE AS rewardValue, R.BADGE_NAME AS badgeName, R.BADGE_IMAGE_URL AS badgeImageUrl, CASE WHEN NVL(UAL.CURRENT_VALUE, 0) >= A.ACHV_MAX_POINT THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS isComplate FROM ACHV A LEFT JOIN USER_ACHV_LIST UAL ON A.ACHV_ID = UAL.ACHV_ID AND UAL.USER_ID = #{userId} LEFT JOIN ACHV_REWARD R ON A.ACHV_ID = R.ACHV_ID
